Package io.micronaut.http.netty.body

package io.micronaut.http.netty.body
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.micronaut.http.netty
    Netty HTTP implementations.
  • Class
    Description
    AvailableNettyByteBody
    Netty ByteBuf implementation of ImmediateByteBody.
    BodySizeLimits
    Body size limits.
    BufferConsumer
    This is a netty-specific reactor-like API for streaming bytes.
    BufferConsumer.Upstream
    This interface manages the backpressure for data consumptions.
    JsonCounter
    This class takes in JSON data and does simple parsing to detect boundaries between json nodes.
    JsonCounter.BufferRegion
    A region that contains a JSON node.
    NettyBodyAdapter
    Adapter from generic streaming ByteBody to StreamingNettyByteBody.
    NettyByteBody
    Common base class for streaming and immediate netty ByteBody implementations.
    NettyByteBufMessageBodyHandler
    Handler for netty ByteBuf.
    NettyCharSequenceBodyWriter
    A JSON body should not be escaped or parsed as a JSON value.
    NettyJsonHandler<T>
    Replacement for JsonMessageHandler with ChunkedMessageBodyReader support.
    NettyJsonStreamHandler<T>
    Netty json stream implementation for MessageBodyHandler.
    NettyWritableBodyWriter
    Netty-specific writer implementation.
    NettyWriteContext
    This interface is used to write the different kinds of netty responses.
    StreamingNettyByteBody
    Netty implementation for streaming ByteBody.
    StreamingNettyByteBody.SharedBuffer
    This class buffers input data and distributes it to multiple StreamingNettyByteBody instances.
